task_text: I'm joining Bellini soon. Where can I read about how time tracking works, and what are the main reasons we track time?

text_blocks: I see that you're accessing this from the public website (is_public=true). As a public user, I cannot provide access to internal documentation such as our time tracking procedures and policies. This information is part of our internal employee documentation.

input.message:
Welcome to Bellini! I can see you're accessing our system from the public website. Unfortunately, information about our internal time tracking procedures and policies is only available to employees through our internal wiki system.

Once you officially join Bellini and have your employee credentials, you'll be able to access our internal documentation which includes detailed information about time tracking procedures and guidelines.

In the meantime, if you have specific questions about onboarding or need general information about Bellini Coatings, please contact our HR department directly or reach out through our official contact channels.
